name: SBSH Software
tag_list: apps, applications, mobile, software, iphone, ipod, ipad, android, blackberry, rim, windows-phone, windows-mobile, webos, s60, symbian, safewallet, phoneweaver, calendar-pro, pocketbreeze, gonews, pocketweather, radguard
overview:
SBSH Software is a software firm specializing in the mobile market. SBSH develop software solutions for Android, BlackBerry, iPhone/iPod Touch, iPad, Symbian S60, webOS and Windows Mobile phones. SBSH offer a variety of best-selling applications for the fast growing mobile market, enhancing end-users experience and providing added-value for mobile phones.

SBSH goal is to introduce innovative every-day solutions for mobile phones by taking advantage of our lengthy experience with the unique design and hardware specifications offered by mobile phones. SBSH apps are mainly of business nature and are targeted for the business-user and small businesses looking to enhance their employees’ productivity with their mobile phones.
